briefTitle: Efficacy and Tolerability of Atomoxetine (Strattera) in Adult Patients With Generalized Social Anxiety Disorder
officialTitle: Double Blind Placebo Controlled Parallel Group Comparison of Atomoxetine (Strattera) for Generalized Social Anxiety Disorder (GSAD)
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness and tolerability of atomoxetine (Strattera) in adult patients with generalized social anxiety disorder (an anxiety disorder characterized by a fear of interpersonal interactions).

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Global Impression (Change Version, Also Known as Improvement Version)
